channel.title: Arubacraft|economy based|pvp|buycraft|iconomy
channel.description:
Arubacraft is an Economy based server that also has Pvp and more. It is run by XxarubianxX and SiLeNcEbOnE. We are in the process of enabling towns. Please come visit.
Rules: 1] No cursing or use of caps 2] No hacking/xray/flying (Donators can fly) 3] No griefing towns (In the wild is ok) 4] No asking for ranks 5] No spamming 6] Listen to Jr. Mods and + Especially the GMs 7] Be nice =]
We try to maintain a fun and respectful community and we would love for more people to make Arubacraft all the more exciting.
To become a player just make a house. IP: mc.arubacraft.com Website: www.arubacraft.com

item.title: Arubacraft|economy based|pvp|buycraft|iconomy
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

MysticLioness:

No no you miss understand! These caps and swearing are more like guidelines! Please give this server a chance! They are very flexible about it cause they themselves do it. This server is really fun give it a try and you will see! We are in need of players and if you would just try it im sure you will like it. Im usually online around 5 - 9pm so if you need anything just ask LionessArtimis1

i shall play try your server but with first one question: is this server cracked? i cant joing unless it is yes. if not then it will have to be a month r two till i can finally buy minecraft .__.

Read full topic

item.title: Arubacraft|economy based|pvp|buycraft|iconomy
item.dc:creator: @MysticLioness MysticLioness
item.description:
@MysticLioness wrote:

Arubacraft is an Economy based server that also has Pvp and more. It is run by XxarubianxX and SiLeNcEbOnE. We are in the process of enabling towns. Please come visit.

Rules:
1] No cursing or use of caps
2] No hacking/xray/flying (Donators can fly)
3] No griefing towns (In the wild is ok)
4] No asking for ranks
5] No spamming
6] Listen to Jr. Mods and + Especially the GMs
7] Be nice =]

We try to maintain a fun and respectful community and we would love for more people to make Arubacraft all the more exciting.

To become a player just make a house.
IP: mc.arubacraft.com
Website: www.arubacraft.com
